*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to George Fisher, Monterey, January 15, 1834. Announcing arrest. Policy in Texan affairs.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Monterey */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-15-1834">15 January 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. Geo: Fisher*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Matamoros*/p*
*p*Dr Sir. The affairs of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, which have given me labor and vexation enough for 13 years past, are likely, as it seems to keep me in difficulties for some time to come. The fact is, that during the last year of general convulsions, it has been almost impossible for any one, who occupies any space in Society, to Keep clear of extanglements of some kind. I have been arrested by an Order from the *person_mentioned*Minister of War*/person_mentioned*, on an accusation made by the *person_mentioned*State Government*/person_mentioned*, and I leave *date_mentioned n="01-16-1834">to morrow*/date_mentioned*, I presume for *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*All I can be accused of is that I have labored diligently and faithfully and with pure intentions to cover the*location_mentioned* wilderness of Texas*/location_mentioned* with an agricultural and usefull *person_mentioned*population */person_mentioned*and to make it a *location_mentioned*State of the Mexican Republic*/location_mentioned*, separate from *location_mentioned*Coahuila*/location_mentioned*. This is no crime,—it is quite the reverse.*/p*
*p*I have sent some claims in that Comisaria, to *person_mentioned*D. W. Smith*/person_mentioned*, to collect, and as you are the *person_mentioned*Comisario*/person_mentioned* I recommend them for pronto despacho.*/p*
*p*I am much pleased with the new *person_mentioned*Comandante General, Don Pedro Lemus*/person_mentioned*, and I recommend him as a man of high honor and liberal principles and a Gentleman.*/p*
*p*The letters I wrote to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned*in your favor caused a great excitement there, in many, against me—if you go there you must be very prudent and accommodating as to *location_mentioned*Custom House*/location_mentioned* matters,—the best way is to let the *location_mentioned*Custom House*/location_mentioned* alone for a year more, and then go there,—or before as an Individual and remove old impressions. I am getting tired of the whole matter of Colonizing—all work and trouble and no profit or credit, for many of them, that are benefitted by me, abuse me. The Basis of the policy which the *location_mentioned*State of Tamaulipas*/location_mentioned* ought to adopt should be—the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*needs population, and all their laws should tend to encourage immigration to that *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, from the *location_mentioned*interior*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*foreign countries*/location_mentioned*, especially the latter.*/p*
*p*I received one letter from you in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*A true copy of the original in my possession, which I certify*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Geo. Fisher*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
